interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Bath Bombs for Kids with Surprise Toys Inside,Bubble Bath Fizzies Gift Set with Santa Claus,Elk& Snowman,Handmade Organic Bath Bombs with Essential Oils,Christmas Gifts for Woman,Girls,Boys
Review Date: 2020/11/24
Store: VinDox
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'VinDox', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Relaxation', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Stain,Relaxing', 'Material Feature': 'Organic', 'Package Dimensions': '8.74 x 8.7 x 3.23 inches; 2.95 Pounds', 'Manufacturer': 'VinDox'}
Review Text: These are so adorable. They are as big as the whole palm of my hand. And they hold a nice surprise toy in the top end when the bath bomb totally fizzes out. Covered with a plastic wrap to keep them from breaking or separating in packaging. Just drop the bath bomb into the tub and watch the fun begin as it starts to fizz and gone off a nice fragrance while the water will turn soft and creamy. They do not stain or leave any residue on your tub, or skin. When the bath is finished you have a nice little toy to play with.
Review Title: Bath bombs for fun
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
